alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 9:11PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Walker and Dade Counties through 1000 PM EST... At 910 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Higdon to near Henagar, and moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Trenton, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, La Fayette, Chattanooga Valley, Rising Fawn, Cole City, Wildwood, Stephensville, Linwood, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights and Fairview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
